content: {{knowledge objective |Identifiant=OIC-198-02-A |Item_parent=Microcrystalline arthropathies |Item_parent_short=Microcrystalline arthropathies |Rank=A |Title=Knowing the threshold value for hyperuricemia |Description=360 µmol/l or 60 mg/l |Rubric=Definition |Contributors= |Order=2}} The solubility threshold for urates is 360 µmol/l or 60 mg/l.

question.title: What is the solubility threshold for urates?

option_a.title: 360 µmol/l
option_a.description: The solubility threshold for urates is 360 µmol/l or 60 mg/l.

option_b.title: 200 µmol/l
option_b.description: The solubility threshold for urates is 200 µmol/l or 40 mg/l.

option_c.title: 100 µmol/l
option_c.description: The solubility threshold for urates is 100 µmol/l or 20 mg/l.

option_d.title: 300 µmol/l
option_d.description: The solubility threshold for urates is 300 µmol/l or 60 mg/l.

correct_option.title: 360 µmol/l
correct_option.description: The solubility threshold for urates is 360 µmol/l or 60 mg/l.
